2013450.name: Asfalia: The Cranky Volcano - Demo
2013450.description:
While investigating what happened to the Lava River, Charlie discovers that it's blocked by a sleeping Samovar. Help Selen, the brave little teacup, wake up Mr Samovar, in order to allow the lava salmon to come back to the lake.

A taste of what's coming

This demo happens roughly in the middle of the story. It's made of just one scene. Enough to give you a taste of what's coming, and tickle your curiosity, while leaving a lot of unanswered questions.

A simple point & click

Asfalia is focused on the narration. Just click to move or interact and let the story unfold. A few simple puzzles will get in the way, but won't stop you for long... hopefully.

More than just a game

Before anything, Asfalia is a children's tale about emotions. But it also opens up a space to discover emotions on a deeper level. The full version of Asfalia will come with extra .pdf contents to allow parents and educators to use the game as a tool for emotional awakening. Those include thematic cards and group activities around the game and emotions.
2013450.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
